name: Spelling Learning Time
description:
This free and simple spelling learning game for children, helps children learn how to spell and recognize words in English in a better way. With colorful pictures including Food,Fruits and Vegetables, Animals, Vehicles, Shapes & Colors, Professionals, Music help improve child English skills every day.

A spelling learning game for helping Parents teach their Toddlers and Children up to the age of 10! Guaranteed to help parents improve your child’s spelling and letter recognition skill.

Also improves your Childs hand-eye co-ordination as they drag the images to their final resting place! Tablet Support!

Features:
- Fun, educational activities for toddlers, children, and parents!
- Colorful graphics and wonderful animations to help children learn.
- Sounds to help children learn phonics for letters and words.
- 7" and 8" and 10" Tablet Supported.

Share this app with friends, family, schools, daycares, non-profit organizations, or simply post about it on Facebook or Twitter.

Enjoy with spelling learning game!!
